inputs.name: PnPSchemaVersion
inputs.label: PnP Xml Schema Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of the Schema that should be used

inputs.name: ResourceFolder
inputs.label: Resource Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Root folder where resources/files that are being referenced in the template are located. If not specified the same folder as where the provisioning template is located will be used.

inputs.name: ClearNavigation
inputs.label: Clear Navigation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the RemoveExistingNodes attribute in the Navigation elements of the template. If you specify this value the navigation nodes will always be removed before adding the nodes in the template

inputs.name: IgnoreDuplicateDataRowErrors
inputs.label: Ignore Duplicate Data Row Errors
inputs.helpMarkDown: Ignore duplicate data row errors when the data row in the template already exists.

inputs.name: OverwriteSystemPropertyBagValues
inputs.label: Overwrite System Property Bag Values
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify this parameter if you want to overwrite and/or create properties that are known to be system entries (starting with vti_, dlc_, etc.)

inputs.name: ProvisionContentTypesToSubWebs
inputs.label: Provision Content Types To Sub Webs
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set content types will be provisioned if the target web is a subweb.
